name: files-compare
description: Check contents of files or stdin to see if they're all equal.

scripts.test: jest && yarn test:cli && fails 'yarn test:cli:fails' && yarn test:cli:stdin && fails 'yarn test:cli:stdin:fails' && yarn test:cli:dist && fails 'yarn test:cli:dist:fails'
scripts.test:cli:stdin:
echo 'this is a test
these are contents' | babel-node ./src/cli.js ./src/__tests__/__fixtures__/one.txt -
scripts.test:cli:stdin:fails:
echo 'not test
these are contents' | babel-node ./src/cli.js ./src/__tests__/__fixtures__/one.txt -
